title: Mark Knopfler 05-06-2005 Lille, France 5.1

Comments : Fantastic DVD made by Poupystar creations & Lady Writer Productions for all of MK's fans !
The audio mixing sound is very good, the videos are awesome => 7cams, dolby digital 2.0 and 5.1... and all English lyrics subtitles are included in this fully authored DVD production !
